name: Frozen Synapse Prime
summary: Take on the role of Tactics, leading a rebel faction to overthrow a powerful corporation controlling the virtual city of Markov Geist. Control an elite strike team of futuristic soldiers; plot paths and issue orders to your units, test your plans and predict your opponent in each turn.
info:
• 中文名: 冰封触点
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS3
  • 平台: PSV
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: SLG
  • 游玩人数: 1-4
  • 发行日期: 2014年11月14日
  • 开发商: Double Eleven
